A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One of the the worst most boring bait and switch movies I could've imagined. Forgetting all gaping plotholes\, which make the movie bad enough as is\, after all the buildup\,  they ruined Luke's legacy as an angry sad old man\, gave us no backstory on Snoke who was a potentially great villian\, took a poop all over Reys background and made a joke of the only remaining villians.  Who cares what happens next? I'll rent ep. 9 at the library when its free. Rian Johnson is a total and utter hack\, and sadly JJ Abrams has no sense of the Star Wars universe.
